programme.title: Spooky Season
programme.desc: The fog is rolling in, which means its time for the spooky season! But dont you worry, because youll be able to keep those ghosts and skeletons happy with all the spooky eats and scary treats in this episode of Tastemades Recipe Rundown!

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Hair-raising Halloween Cakes
programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Spooky Halloween Party Bakes
programme.desc: Make your Halloween Party the talk of every boy and ghoul in the neighborhood! Whether its the poisoned apples, the drippy candle cakes, coffin pies or savory treats (or tricks) these delicious bakes will surely delight and scare.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! Its spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Frankies Italian Faves
programme.desc: Everyone knows Frankie cant live without pasta, but this week he shares his favorite Italian recipes that dont require any kneading. Add these simple, delicious dishes to your weeknight menu to complete your Italian dish repertoire.

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and dont forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Sausage Egg And Cheese All Day Long
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings out the best of brunch with sweet and savory hits such as Bacon Wrapped Dates Stuffed with Chorizo, Maple Sausage, Egg, And Cheese Fried Rice, and the tastiest BBQ Duck, Egg, And Corn Scallion Pancake Sandwiches youve ever eaten.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Perfectly Prepared Steaks
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, And grill up the biggest and best steaks out there. From a Hanger Steak with Salsa Verde to a Ribeye with Ginger Chili Relish, and tops it all off with the father of all steaks The Porterhouse.

programme.title: Pizza Party on the Grill
programme.desc: Its Pizza Time! Chef Dale Talde grills up amazing pizzas for every palate including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie with a Spiced Chick Peas And Potatoes, and gives your childhood favorite French Bread Pizza a much needed upgrade.

programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.desc: Mad Good Food Host Derrell Smith joins Chef Dale Talde at the grill as they cook up some stupendous sandwiches including a Salmon Pastrami Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even some Grilled Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: New Orleans-Style Shrimp And Oysters
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings us to the bayou as he creates a NOLA-inspired menu complete with Chargrilled Oysters, Black Pepper Shrimp Poboys, finishes it off with Bananas Foster, and washes it all down with a Fruity Grilled Hurricane.

programme.title: Sunday Vietnamese Brisket with Noodles
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde shows us how he does Sunday up right as he grills up some Vietnamese Brisket with Rice Noodles, Crispy Swordfish Summer Rolls, and tops it all off with some tasty Soju Floats. Hey, its Sunday somewhere, right?

programme.title: Beer Brats And BBQ Ribs
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up summer favorites perfect for any backyard BBQ. Cheddar beer brats in a pretzel bun, BBQ lamb ribs with Chinese mustard sauce, watermelon lime soju punch, And warm donuts with grilled strawberries And whipped cream for dessert.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings your basic burgers to a new level with his dry-aged beef burger with potatoes and truffle dijon mayo, a part-beef part-pork belly burger with cheddar And an egg, and lastly a crispy mushroom tortilla burger with salsa And cheese.

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab And Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, And sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza vans mobile oven.

programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Spooky Halloween Party Bakes
programme.desc: Make your Halloween Party the talk of every boy and ghoul in the neighborhood! Whether its the poisoned apples, the drippy candle cakes, coffin pies or savory treats (or tricks) these delicious bakes will surely delight and scare.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! Its spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.desc: Program masakan yang berbentuk cabaran kepada isteri-isteri selebriti untuk menjadikan makanan yang paling tidak disukai oleh suami mereka sebagai hidangan yang digemari oleh suami masing-masing.

programme.title: The Magician

programme.title: Officer of the Year

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Three lifelong friends get wrapped up in a robbery-arson case. Suspicious of the investigation and the police, Hyun-tae starts digging for the truth himself and asks his best friend for help.

programme.title: Exhuma
programme.desc: Exhuma follows two shamans, a feng shui expert and an undertaker as they seek to help a Korean-American family tormented by an ancestral curse.

programme.title: Return of the Mafia
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung is insecure about her appearance. She joined the yoga academy wishing to restore beauty, yet strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the worlds most legendary con man.

programme.title: The Magician

programme.title: My Puppy

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: Hijack 1971
programme.desc: Detonation of an explosive device causes terror in the flight and pilot Gyu-Sik loses sight in one eye. Yong-dae who hatched the hijacking plot, threatens to take the plane to North Korea.

programme.title: Ordinary Person
programme.desc: Sung-jin is a police officer involved in a conspiracy after he arrested a suspected murderer by chance. Gyu-nam make use of Sung-jins weakness, his family, to strike a deal with him.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: On the journey to find her missing younger sister, she discovered the violence and sexual abuse her sister had suffered and is determined to take a revenge.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Decision to Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago in the past. Through the letter, the story of his first love and friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Three lifelong friends get wrapped up in a robbery-arson case. Suspicious of the investigation and the police, Hyun-tae starts digging for the truth himself and asks his best friend for help.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E063
programme.desc: Hilario se sorprende cuando al cavar la tumba descubre que el cadver de Rosendo ya no se encuentra en el lugar; Fernanda y Nicols tambien se desconciertan porque se supone que ah iban a encontrar el cuerpo de Leopoldo. Yosmir y Chabeto estn frente a la casa de Eugenia cuando el cantante del grupo musical les avisa que no va a poder ir a dar la serenata a la muchacha. Victoria le da una bofetada a Nicols cuando el asegura que no puede sentir nada por la mujer que mato a su querido to; la joven le exige que se marche cuanto antes de su casa y le manda a decir a Florencia que se aleje lo mas que pueda de su padre y de ella. Leopoldo asegura a Marisa que no est muy seguro de que haya sido Victoria quien le disparo porque las imgenes de lo ocurrido todava estn muy confusas en su mente; sin embargo, de lo que s est seguro, es que si la guerra entre los Guanipa y los De Casal vuelve a comenzar, el tendr que aparecer de nuevo.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E064
programme.desc: Hilario asegura a Moncho que piensa asistir a la cita que le hicieron a Florencia para enfrentar a esa persona misteriosa que se ha atrevido a esconderse de el en sus propias tierras. Leopoldo pide a Marisa averigue todo lo que este pasando entre su familia y los Guanipa, pues necesita estar informado al respecto. Nicols avisa a Victoria y a Adelaida que Hilario est herido, pero ya fue llevado al hospital; Victoria est convencida de que fue la familia del joven Del Casal quienes lo atacaron a pesar de que Nicols asegura que no es as. Florencia les revela a Victoria, Adelaida y Nicols que Hilario le dijo que fue Zambrano, su antiguo capataz, quien lo hirio; adems, la joven Zapata informa a Victoria que Hilario estaba en su casa porque quera saber si la persona que la haba citado a ella era la misma que se llevo el cadver de Rosendo del lugar donde el -Hilario- lo haba enterrado.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E73
programme.desc: Fausto con doble intencion invita a Camila a cenar en su casa para que se relacione con su nueva familia. Ezequiel insiste en hablarle de romance y sentimientos y la joven le recuerda que no fue eso lo que pactaron. Marcelina visita a Ezequiel en el hospital y este aprovecha para amenazarla si vuelve a intentar hacerle dao a Camila.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E74
programme.desc: Camila est alerta sobre la evidente hipocresa de Fausto y Patricia, sin embargo, logra salir airosa de las incesantes preguntas manteniendose firme en su estrategia de traer la paz a las dos familias. Inconvenientes, con Roger y con Gregorio se los cuenta a Ezequiel que le promete que podr cobrarse todo lo que le han hecho.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E93
programme.desc: Illis reveals to Clara Ines that it was Cirilo who verified that she was his daughter; Clara and her mother seal their longed-for reunion with an embrace.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E94
programme.desc: Bernice agrees to take Tirso to a man that Pastora assures her will turn her beloved into a gentleman.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E93
programme.desc: When Gertrudis goes to tell Claudio everything she agreed with Mara Lourdes, he reiterates that he plans to escape because he is not willing to go to jail - Virginia gets upset when she sees Elvis taking Mara ngeles to visit Gael - Alberto continues verbally attacking Lorena, when suddenly Omar arrives with other policemen to take her into custody.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E70
programme.desc: Cesar le exige a Adriana que le diga si se caso con el enamorada o no.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E71
programme.desc: Los pinches defienden a Adriana. Ninoska aprovecha para sugerirle a Azalea que precise a Cesar exigiendole que le de su puesto como la madre de los Perroni.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E064
programme.desc: Hilario asegura a Moncho que piensa asistir a la cita que le hicieron a Florencia para enfrentar a esa persona misteriosa que se ha atrevido a esconderse de el en sus propias tierras. Leopoldo pide a Marisa averigue todo lo que este pasando entre su familia y los Guanipa, pues necesita estar informado al respecto. Nicols avisa a Victoria y a Adelaida que Hilario est herido, pero ya fue llevado al hospital; Victoria est convencida de que fue la familia del joven Del Casal quienes lo atacaron a pesar de que Nicols asegura que no es as. Florencia les revela a Victoria, Adelaida y Nicols que Hilario le dijo que fue Zambrano, su antiguo capataz, quien lo hirio; adems, la joven Zapata informa a Victoria que Hilario estaba en su casa porque quera saber si la persona que la haba citado a ella era la misma que se llevo el cadver de Rosendo del lugar donde el -Hilario- lo haba enterrado.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E065
programme.desc: Adelaida informa a Hilario que los medicos indican que debe ser trasladado a la capital para operarlo. Jons visita a Liliana para invitarla a su matrimonio con Antonieta; aunque el joven asegura estar contento con el evento, la muchacha percibe que Jons no est muy convencido con el paso que va a dar. Victoria agradece a Nicols que salvara a Hilario; la pareja se sorprende al ver a Federico, pues Del Casal crea que su primo ya no estaba en el llano; al quedarse a solas de nuevo, Victoria abraza a Nicols en un gesto de agradecimiento; momento en el cual Florencia los sorprende y evidencia su molestia al verlos tan juntos. Fernanda asegura a Nicols que ya tiene las pruebas que necesitan para meter presa a Victoria cuando se entera de que Felipe est con Antonieta. Victoria manda a llamar a Jack, a quien piensa empezar a cobrarle algunas de las deudas que tiene con ella.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E73

programme.desc: Bernice agrees to take Tirso to a man that Pastora assures her will turn her beloved into a gentleman.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E95
programme.desc: After finding out about Illis disappearance, Clara tells Gabriel, Tamara, Israel and Pereto that nothing bad can happen to her mother.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E94
programme.desc: Lorena will be arrested because they found the gun with which Marco Aurelio was murdered and it has her fingerprints on it. Claudio refuses to go to jail to save Gertrudis; he prefers to flee. Claudio is about to leave the hotel where he has been hiding, when the police suddenly appear to take him into custody.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E95
programme.desc: The police chief tries to corner Gertrudis to make her confess, but helped by Mara Lourdes the woman insists on her innocence - Accompanied by Patricia, Lorena appears before Judge Echeverri for a preliminary hearing. He asks her if she is aware of the serious trouble she is in and Lorena nods and then affirms and swears to God that she did not kill Marco Aurelio Corona.

Claudio refuses to go to jail to save Gertrudis; he prefers to flee. Claudio is about to leave the hotel where he has been hiding, when the police suddenly appear to take him into custody.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E71
programme.desc: Los pinches defienden a Adriana. Ninoska aprovecha para sugerirle a Azalea que precise a Cesar exigiendole que le de su puesto como la madre de los Perroni.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E72
programme.desc: Cesar insiste en saber si Carlos Ral y Adriana se entienden a sus espaldas, pero el medico evade responderle.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E065
programme.desc: Adelaida informa a Hilario que los medicos indican que debe ser trasladado a la capital para operarlo. Jons visita a Liliana para invitarla a su matrimonio con Antonieta; aunque el joven asegura estar contento con el evento, la muchacha percibe que Jons no est muy convencido con el paso que va a dar. Victoria agradece a Nicols que salvara a Hilario; la pareja se sorprende al ver a Federico, pues Del Casal crea que su primo ya no estaba en el llano; al quedarse a solas de nuevo, Victoria abraza a Nicols en un gesto de agradecimiento; momento en el cual Florencia los sorprende y evidencia su molestia al verlos tan juntos. Fernanda asegura a Nicols que ya tiene las pruebas que necesitan para meter presa a Victoria cuando se entera de que Felipe est con Antonieta. Victoria manda a llamar a Jack, a quien piensa empezar a cobrarle algunas de las deudas que tiene con ella.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E066
programme.desc: Fernanda, Nicols y en especial Antonieta no pueden creer que sea cierto que Jons no se va a presentar en el matrimonio como asegura Felipe; la seora le prohbe a su hija que se ponga a llorar y les ordena a su sobrino y a Felipe que vayan en busca del novio y lo traigan aunque sea a empujones. La furia de Adelaida contra Hilario aumenta cuando el hombre sugiere que ella quiere irse a la ciudad para escuchar las palabras de amor de Hansen; la mujer exige a su esposo la respete. En la habitacion de Nicols en la mansion Alcoy, el y Victoria se dejan arrastrar por el amor que los une y se entregan a la pasion.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E74
programme.desc: Camila est alerta sobre la evidente hipocresa de Fausto y Patricia, sin embargo, logra salir airosa de las incesantes preguntas manteniendose firme en su estrategia de traer la paz a las dos familias. Inconvenientes, con Roger y con Gregorio se los cuenta a Ezequiel que le promete que podr cobrarse todo lo que le han hecho.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E75
programme.desc: Roger, lleva a Camila a un edificio en construccion, solitario, bajo coaccion la hace hablar con Ezequiel, quien amenaza a Roger con matarlo si llega a daar a Camila. Roger expresa todo el odio como fue que asesino a su hermano Marcos. Max y Torrealba llegan y encuentran a Roger descontrolado, con Camila de rehen.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E95
programme.desc: After finding out about Illis disappearance, Clara tells Gabriel, Tamara, Israel and Pereto that nothing bad can happen to her mother.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E96
programme.desc: With the feeling that something strange is going on with Illis, Clara Ines visits her mother in her room; the impostor tries to manipulate Clara.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E95
programme.desc: The police chief tries to corner Gertrudis to make her confess, but helped by Mara Lourdes the woman insists on her innocence - Accompanied by Patricia, Lorena appears before Judge Echeverri for a preliminary hearing. He asks her if she is aware of the serious trouble she is in and Lorena nods and then affirms and swears to God that she did not kill Marco Aurelio Corona.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E96
programme.desc: Alberto interrupts a conversation between Gertrudis and Mara Lourdes to ask the Prosecutor to spare no effort to put Claudio and Lorena in jail. Gertrudis recommends Lourdes to follow her instructions to win the trial, who accepts with resignation. Then, behind her sons back, she gives Lourdes another check as payment for her services and complicity.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E01 - Diana A Portrait
programme.desc: Diana, Princess of Wales, was incredibly enchanting and unforgettable, leaving a lasting impact like no other woman of her era. Known as a fairy-tale princess, a loving wife, a dedicated mother, and a style icon, this documentary digs deeper to uncover the true person behind the endless spotlight.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E05 - Soaked Spirits
programme.desc: R.L. shares with Casey about the tough times that helped him understand why Be Alive matters so much. Chris and Kaid are stuck in the tent because of the harsh Alaskan weather. Meanwhile, Casey and R.L. manage to find some food.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E06 - Bearing Down
programme.desc: As they were having dinner, Casey noticed a bear wandering on the hill. Both he and R.L. sprinted through the rain, trying to get closer. Meanwhile, Chris was getting fed up with staying in the tent.

programme.desc: Chris and Kaid, who have been stuck in the tent for several days, finally get a break when the weather improves. They realize the rain has caused the river to rise to dangerous levels. Still, their hunt for big animals continues.

programme.desc: Chris and Kaid are on the trail of a huge bull moose, and Kaid lines up the shot. Meanwhile, Casey and R.L. are still on the hunt for big game. The river levels remain stubbornly high and wild.

programme.title: Been There All Along
programme.desc: After her public breakup, Charley, determined founder of a dating app, is near bankruptcy and teamed up with Liam, a self-assured and innovative marketing expert, to save her company.

programme.title: Rear View Mirror
programme.desc: A young mother tries to escape her abusive, controlling husband and start a new life in an idyllic, peaceful beach town.

programme.title: Here Kills the Bride
programme.desc: Inspired by the Highly Acclaimed Thriller - The Perfect Bride Jessica is shocked to find out that her brother, Carlos, is getting married in a week to Grace, a girl he just met in a strip club, something he would never regularly do. Determined to find out the real reasons behind the marriage, Jessica gets pulled into a whirlwind of events, putting her own life at risk. Is Carlos in trouble? Or is Grace a victim?

programme.title: Home for a Royal Heart
programme.desc: When the seaside town of Shaw Bay is under threat of a redevelopment, realtor Erin will do anything to save it. Cue the handsome Theo, a royal looking for a new property. The catch is, hes hiding the royal part.

programme.title: A Bet with the Matchmaker
programme.desc: A relationship columnist on the brink of losing her job takes a bet with a self proclaimed match maker who guarantees to find her perfect match.

programme.title: Three Dates to Forever
